I

incrementAndCheckPinAttempt(String) - Static method in class Security
Increments the PIN attempt count for a given username and checks if the account should be locked based on the maximum number of allowed attempts.

P

performTwoFactorAuthentication() - Method in class Security
Simulates two-factor authentication (2FA) by sending a verification code to the user's email address.

R

resetPinAttempt(String) - Static method in class Security
Resets the PIN attempt counter for a specific user.

S

Security - Class in Unnamed Package
Provides security features including hashing data, validating account numbers and PINs, managing PIN attempt counts, and handling two-factor authentication (2FA) via email.
Security() - Constructor for class Security
Constructs a new Security instance with a default, empty user email.

U
